subject: Standard Replies of NHAI for Common Pre-bid queries in HAM Projects â€“ reg.
text: HRay <7zy rTHTf qfeazrut (73q 4aa7 &r rTHrf +A14, HRa TraT) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) mtr Td #-5 & 6, #acr-10, ERa, # @odlt_ 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 3HV/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAIPolicy Guidelines/Procurement/2024 Policy Circular No.8.1.27/2024 dated O6th March, 2024 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/Pre-bid/HAM/CMD/2023-24 (Comp. No. 240412)} Sub: Standard Replies of NHAI for Common Pre-bid queries in HAM Projects reg: It has been decided to standardize the replies of certain common pre-bid queries of HAM Projects for clarity and uniformity in pre bid being given by various Technical Divisions. 2. In the light of above, Standard Replies to 2 pre-bid queries for HAM Projects are enclosed at Annexure-| to serve as a guide to the Technical Divisions while framing replies to such pre-bid queries. 3. All Technical Divisions to note that the enclosure was loaded on the Highway Titans WhatsApp Group at 01:31 PM on 19.02.2024 and Chairman, NHAI directed all Technical Divisions to follow it in preparing pre-bid replies: If replies have already been given, the amended replies in these 2 issues be re-issued. 4 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. Encl:: As stated above Glgley (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord:) Tu: All Officers of NHAI HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1_ Hindi Division for translation in Hindi. 2. Library for hosting the circular on library site: 3 Web Admin for circulation: 'M 779 NHAL replies Copy
